sub_title: Director of Delivery @ Sana Commerce | Driving Customer Satisfaction, Revenue Growth
summary:
I am a results-oriented and adaptable professional with over 15 years of experience in managing global delivery teams and projects. As the Director of Delivery EMEA & APAC at Sana Commerce, I oversee the execution and support of e-commerce solutions for customers across diverse regions and industries, with a focus on driving customer satisfaction, increasing service revenue, and promoting employee engagement.

With a global mindset and a lean leadership approach, I work closely with offices in the Netherlands, Dubai, Australia, and Sri Lanka to ensure seamless collaboration and deliver exceptional results. I excel in fostering open communication, encouraging autonomy, and empowering individuals to take initiative and learn from hands-on experiences. I am adept at navigating complexity and implementing changes in rapidly growing and dynamic environments, effectively scaling up operations while maintaining quality and efficiency. I am committed to continuous improvement and embrace new challenges and opportunities to leverage my adaptability and drive organizational success.

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for the execution and support with an emphasis on driving customer satisfaction, increasing service revenue, and promoting employee engagement. With a global mindset, I work closely with offices in the Netherlands, Dubai, Australia, and Sri Lanka to ensure seamless collaboration and deliver exceptional results.

My dedication to customer satisfaction is one of the drivers of my work. By actively listening to customer needs and anticipating their wishes, I strive to exceed their expectations. I am driven by the belief that a satisfied customer is the basis of long-term success.

In addition to prioritizing customer satisfaction, I am committed to driving revenue growth from our services. I accomplish this by diligently focusing on key factors such as driving accurate estimations, ensuring continuous project progress, and maintaining effective budget management. By actively managing these critical elements, I actively contribute to the organization's overall financial success.

Recognizing the crucial role of employee engagement, I foster an environment where team members feel valued, empowered, and motivated to deliver their best work.  By promoting open lines of communication, fostering autonomy, and encouraging initiative, I nurture a culture of high performance and continuous improvement.

Collaboration across geographically dispersed teams is essential to my role. Through effective communication, cultural understanding, and leveraging technology, I ensure seamless coordination and knowledge sharing among global offices. This collaborative approach enhances project outcomes and drives organizational success.
